solution_line_template: First find how many calories per hour Brandon gets from squirrels: {calories_per_squirrel} calories/squirrel * {squirrels_per_hour} squirrels = <<{calories_per_squirrel}*{squirrels_per_hour}={squirrel_calories_per_hour}>>{squirrel_calories_per_hour} calories
Then find how many calories per hour Brandon gets from rabbits: {calories_per_rabbit} calories/rabbit * {rabbits_per_hour} rabbits = {rabbit_calories_per_hour} calories

Then subtract the number of calories per hour from rabbits from the number from squirrels to find the difference: {squirrel_calories_per_hour} calories - {rabbit_calories_per_hour} calories = <<{squirrel_calories_per_hour}-{rabbit_calories_per_hour}={calorie_difference}>>{calorie_difference} calories
